brand.assets_description: Manage your website's visual identity and brand assets
brand.page_description: Manage your website's visual identity including logos, favicons, and other brand assets. All uploads are optimized and stored securely.
brand.show_text_next_to_logo_desc: Display text alongside the logo in the header
brand.logo_text_placeholder: Enter text to display next to logo
brand.logo_text_hint: Leave empty to use site name as default
brand.logo_text_setting_updated: Logo text setting has been updated
brand.logo_text_setting_update_failed: Failed to update logo text setting
brand.alt_text_placeholder: Enter descriptive alt text for accessibility and SEO
brand.alt_text_hint: Alt text helps screen readers and improves SEO. Leave empty to use site name as default.

analytics.title: Analytics Configuration
analytics.description: Configure Google Analytics and Mixpanel for tracking user behavior and analytics
analytics.enable_google_analytics_desc: Track user interactions with Google Analytics 4
analytics.ga_measurement_id_desc: Your Google Analytics 4 Measurement ID (e.g., G-XXXXXXXXXX)
analytics.enable_mixpanel_desc: Track events and user behavior with Mixpanel
analytics.mixpanel_token_desc: Your Mixpanel project token (32-character hex string)
analytics.mixpanel_api_host_desc: Custom API host for Mixpanel (default: api.mixpanel.com)
analytics.track_admin_actions_desc: Include admin panel interactions in analytics tracking
analytics.anonymize_ip_desc: Remove last octet from IP addresses before sending to analytics services
analytics.privacy_notice_desc: Ensure you comply with privacy regulations like GDPR and CCPA. Inform users about data collection in your privacy policy and provide opt-out options where required.
analytics.ga_invalid_format: Invalid Google Analytics 4 ID format. Should be G-XXXXXXXXXX
analytics.mixpanel_invalid_format: Invalid Mixpanel token format. Should be 32-character hex string

main_logo.title: Main Logo
main_logo.description: Primary website logo displayed in header and navigation
guidelines: Use PNG or SVG format for transparency support
Ensure logo is readable on both light and dark backgrounds
Maintain 3:1 aspect ratio for optimal display

favicon.title: Favicon
favicon.description: Small icon displayed in browser tabs and bookmarks
guidelines: Use ICO format for maximum compatibility
Keep design simple and recognizable at small sizes

footer_logo.title: Footer Logo
footer_logo.description: Logo displayed in the website footer
guidelines: Can be different from main logo (e.g., monochrome version)
Should work well on footer background color
Keep similar proportions to main logo

social_share_image.title: Social Share Image
social_share_image.description: Default image shown when site is shared on social media
guidelines: Use 1200x630px for optimal social media display
Include key branding elements and text
Avoid small text that becomes unreadable when resized

login_background.title: Login Background
login_background.description: Background image for login and authentication pages
guidelines: Use high-quality images with good contrast
Ensure login forms remain readable over the image
Consider using subtle gradients or overlays

logo.description: Upload your website logo. Recommended size: 200x60px or similar ratio.
logo.guideline_1: Use PNG format with transparent background for best results
logo.guideline_2: Recommended dimensions: 200x60px or maintain 3:1 aspect ratio
logo.guideline_3: Ensure logo is readable on both light and dark backgrounds
logo.guideline_4: File size should be under 5MB for optimal loading
logo.only_images: Only image files are allowed for logos
logo.file_too_large: Logo file must be smaller than 5MB
logo.setting_saved: Logo setting has been saved successfully

messages.media_deleted_successfully_description: The media file has been removed
messages.please_select_files: Please select one or more files
messages.confirm_delete_media: Are you sure you want to delete this media file?

tips.validation: Form validation will guide you through any errors

floating_icons.title: Floating icons
floating_icons.subtitle: Manage floating quick actions on the storefront

hero.title: Delight shoppers with floating icons
hero.description: Highlight hotlines, live chat, or scroll helpers so visitors can reach you instantly.
hero.tip_customize: Mix icons, colors, and tooltips to match your brand voice.
hero.tip_order: Reorder buttons so the most important actions stay closest to the thumb.
hero.tip_effects: Use gentle animations to draw attention without distracting shoppers.

quick_actions.title: Quick actions
quick_actions.description: Add new shortcuts or refresh data. Every change saves automatically.

empty.title: No floating icons yet
empty.subtitle: Create quick actions like call, email, or Zalo to help customers reach you faster.

actions.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this icon?

form.effect_hint: Use animations to highlight important actions like hotlines.
form.transparent_bg_hint: Remove button background and shadow so only the icon is visible.
form.active_hint: Disable to hide without deleting the icon.
